item.title: Winja CTF | C0C0N 2021
item.description: Winja organised Capture-the-Flag competition for all, women and men participants, at c0c0n 2021 security and hacking virtual conference. Event Details Official CTF Writeups By Sneha Surana (D@e77$ep, b74ass, Esoteric, Hardy) By Sanjay Das (Cha-Cha-Cha, MyProfile, 1NoCLI, MissConfig, Andromeda) By Aravindha Hariharan (Reciprical Cipher, BlogQL, Circle Cipher, The Valet, Hash Map, Believe Your Eyes) Community Writeups Believe Your Eyes, Find My Address, Hardy, Reciprical Cypher, Decode Me, D@e77$ep, BlogQL, The Valet - By NilbinSec Esoteric, Believe Your Eyes, Hardy, Anonymous, b74ass - By aman333nolawz Cha-Cha-Cha - By MustafaRaad7 Bomb Defusal - By MustafaRaad7 D@e77$ep - By fl4M3x BlogQL - By sinnerx9 Anonymous - By exploit.

item.title: Winja Talks | 09 September 2021
item.description: “So you want to get into Cybersecurity?” by Aditi Bhatnagar. This talk was focused on speaker’s journey into the field of cybersecurity.

item.title: Winja Talks | 26 August 2021
item.description: “Building Resilient Communities” by Shivani Singh. This talk was focused on creating communities that are robust, resilient, diverse and what goes behind building something like this.
